annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I’m making a Sazerac, which is a drink people have been asking me to cover for some time now. This drink is famously associa...
annotations.title: Sazerac | How to Drink

annotations.description: The Sazerac cocktail is purported to have been invented in 1850 in New Orleans by a man named Antoine Amedee Peychaud. He was a pharmacist who ran a drugstor...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Sazerac

textContent:
4 dashes  Peychauds Bitters 
1 Sugar Cube
2oz Rye Whiskey

Muddle sugar cube
Stir and pour into absinthe rinsed glass. 
Garnish with lemon peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RuZzOcjJUYw&t=0s

---

2oz Rye
Barspoon of Gomme/Simple syrup
3 dashes peychauds bitters
1 dash absinthe

Stir and pour
Garnish with Lemon peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mQ69_TRoZhE
title: Sazerac
